name: build-an-image-search-abstraction-layer-be
description: a JavaScript api that allows you to search for images

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node --require @babel/register server/database/db Createtables  && npm run defaultstesting && NODE_ENV=testing nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register --timeout 10000 --exit  server/tests/*.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --require @babel/register server/database/db Createtables  && npm run defaultsproduction && NODE_ENV=production babel-node server/server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db Createtables  && npm run defaults && nodemon --exec babel-node --presets @babel/preset-env server/server.js

author: Jonathan Nshuti
